title: Bada$$ Race Wars
itunes:title: Bada$$ Race Wars
description:
FRI 8/12 - The Breakfast Club is joined by Joey Bada$$ to discuss his first taste of radio success with the song "Devastated" and why he chooses to still live with his mom. Then Sherrod Small & Christian Finnegan (hosts of A&E's show "Black & White") stop by to fuse humor with racism as they debate stereotypes!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
